io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.net

Interface Client2D

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Client, TickBased

    public interface Client2D
extends Client
    The client for the world2d engine.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

      • getWind

        float getWind()
        Gets the strength of the wind effect. A negative number will reverse the wind.
        Returns:
        A float value.

      • walkY

        void walkY(double s,
           double delta)
        Called to indicate that the player has walked in the X axis.
        Parameters:
        s - The distance the player has walked (1 for button presses). This value will be different for control systems that are analogue.
        delta - The time since the last game update in seconds.

      • walkX

        void walkX(double s,
           double delta)
        Called to indicate that the player has walked in the Y axis.
        Parameters:
        s - The distance the player has walked (1 for button presses). This value will be different for control systems that are analogue.
        delta - The time since the last game update in seconds.

      • requestChunk

        void requestChunk(long x,
                  long y,
                  long z)
        Indicates a request from the world for a chunk at the specified position.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position of the chunk
        y - The Y position of the chunk
        z - The Z position of the chunk
        See Also:
        ABTWorld, ABTNetWorld

      • getRequestedChunks

        java.util.List<io.github.tomaso2468.abt.TagGroup> getRequestedChunks()
        Gets the list of received requested chunks.
        Returns:
        A list of tag groups representing chunk data.

      • setSprint

        void setSprint(boolean s)
        Sets if the sprint controls are enabled.
        Parameters:
        s - true if sprint is pressed, false otherwise.
